remark.ch: 強烈建議須先修CM1009，欲以密碼卡加選的同學，請於2/21(三)上課時領取，逾時不再發放密碼卡

goal.en: Conceptual learning and problem solving have been fundamental to our approach in chemistry through the textbook. We hope to help students learn to think like a chemist so they can apply the process of problem solving to all aspects of their lives.
goal.ch: 基本上透過教科書來學習化學的基本概念及解決化學的問題。希望幫助學生學會像一個化學家般的思考，他們可將解決問題的過程，應用他們在各方面的生活上。

content.en:
“going to have 9 chapters:
13. Chemical Kinetics
14. Chemical Equilibrium
15. Aqueous Equilibria: Acids and Bases
16. Applications of Aqueous Equilibria
17. Thermodynamics: Entropy, Free Energy, and Equilibrium
18. Electrochemistry
20. Transition Elements and Coordination Chemistry
22. The Main-Group Elements
23. Organic and Biological Chemistry“
content.ch:
“授課 9 章
13. 化學動力學
14. 化學平衡
15. 水溶液中的平衡：酸與鹼
16. 水溶液中平衡的應用
17. 熱力學：熵、自由能與平衡
18. 電化學
20. 過渡元素與配位化學
22. 主族元素
23. 有機與生物化學“

textbook.en: “Chemistry, 7th ed. by John E. McMurry, Robert C. Fay and Jill K. Robinson. Published by Pearson Prentice Hall“
textbook.ch: Chemistry，第七版，John E. McMurry、Robert C. Fay 與 Jill K. Robinson合著

grading.en: “Quizzes and Roll call 25％, Midterm I 30％, Midterm II 30％, Final Exam 30％. The dates of 3 exams will be announced in class.“
grading.ch: 隨堂測驗與點名 25％、期中考I 30％、期中考II 30％、期末考 30％。考試日期於上課時宣布。
